title: War Of The Worlds
description:
War Of The Worlds (1988)
Action / Drama / Horror / Sci-Fi
2 Seasons / 43 Episodes
IMDB Rating 6.7/10 

Humanity must resume its war against the Martians when they revive decades after their defeat in the 1950's.

Video: 23.976 fps at 1.33 AR
Audio: VBR 160 kbps English Stereo Surround

Notes:
These are the best available versions of the episodes that I could find, as of early 2014. It was hard to find any un-mangled versions of these files! The video quality is at a decent level for an 80's TV show, but today's DVD qualities are higher in comparison. I transcoded these from the AVI source files using x264 with a CRF of 23, which is a good MSD type quality, especially considering the source material. Season 1 is 640x480, and season 2 is mainly 544x400 with a few at 576x432.
